CustomField.description: A third comment entered by the submitter when the request was submitted. The comment label is specified by the "Submission Comment 3 Label" field in the related approval process definition.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A third comment entered by the submitter when the request was submitted. The comment label is specified by the "Submission Comment 3 Label" field in the related approval process definition.
CustomField.label: Submission Comment 3
